name: generator

schema.title: Create a Generator for an Nx Plugin
schema.description: Create a Generator for an Nx Plugin.

path.description: The file path to the generator without the file extension (e.g. `my-plugin/src/generators/my-generator` generates the file `my-plugin/src/generators/my-generator.ts`). Relative to the current working directory.
path.x-prompt: What is the generator file path?

name.description: The generator name to export in the plugin generators collection.

unitTestRunner.description: Test runner to use for unit tests.

skipLintChecks.description: Do not add an eslint configuration for plugin json files.

skipFormat.description: Do not format files with prettier.

description: Create a generator for an Nx Plugin.
